newsitem.title: COLOMBIA: Colombian peso ends lower vs dollar at 1,060.35.
newsitem.headline: Colombian peso ends lower vs dollar at 1,060.35.

text.p: BOGOTA, April 14 Reuter - Colombia's peso closed down 1.65 pesos against the dollar on Monday at 1,060.35 after quiet trading on the interbank market, dealers said.

Traders told Reuters there were reports that the central bank had bought dollars to prevent the peso from rising on an expected influx of foreign capital after a recent court ruling that blocked a six percent tax on new foreign loans.
The bank declines to comment on its forays into the foreign exchange market, and there was no confirmation that it had bought dollars.
Dealers reported 291 trades for a below-average total of $115 million. The peso moved between an intraday high of 1,057 and a low of 1,060.35, they said.
